name: places/ChIJccSd8FVYwokRJgkzu9M1D_Q
formattedAddress: 333 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 333 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Veteran chain for musical instruments, plus DJ & lighting gear & recording equipment.

originalText.text:
Sam Ash is a music lover's paradise! The store is brimming with an extensive selection of musical instruments, ranging from electric guitars and semi-hollow guitars to acoustic, bass, saxophones, drums, and violins. The variety available caters to musicians of all genres and skill levels.

What sets Sam Ash apart is the atmospheric charm it exudes. As soon as you step in, you're enveloped in a musical ambiance that resonates with passion. The layout is well-organized, allowing for an unhurried exploration of the diverse instruments on display.

One highlight is the impressive assortment of electric guitars, each with its unique character and design. The collection extends beyond the commonplace, making it a haven for enthusiasts looking for something special. The range of other instruments further adds to the store's allure, offering a comprehensive musical experience under one roof.

The store's atmosphere also hints at a potential collector's touch. There's a sense that the owner understands and appreciates the artistry behind each instrument, creating an environment that fosters a connection between musicians and their tools.

The staff at Sam Ash are knowledgeable and approachable, ready to assist whether you're a seasoned musician or a novice exploring the world of instruments. Their expertise enhances the overall shopping experience, making it not just a transaction but a musical journey.

In conclusion, Sam Ash is a haven for music enthusiasts, offering a diverse array of instruments in a welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're in search of a new guitar, drum kit, or any other musical tool, the store's expansive collection and collector's touch make it a standout destination. My visit was truly enjoyable, and I highly recommend Sam Ash to anyone with a passion for music and instruments.

originalText.text: Max was really great. Very caring and nice. Appreciated what he did for me and ensuring I leave out with the item I wanted. Please give him a raise.

originalText.text: Was expecting more of this place. Hardly any staff to help you out. And the staff that was there, was talking to eachother. Collection of instruments is good. The pro-recording department was disappointing and small.

text.text: Was expecting more of this place. Hardly any staff to help you out. And the staff that was there, was talking to eachother. Collection of instruments is good. The pro-recording department was disappointing and small.

originalText.text: Great place, I found everything I was looking for at a very good price. I was looking for items for my podcast, I recommend it.

text.text: Great place, I found everything I was looking for at a very good price. I was looking for items for my podcast, I recommend it.

originalText.text: Great selection of digital pianos to try in-person, and the staff was super helpful when I needed assistance, and not pushy when I didn't. Arthur was the team member who helped me figure out which digital piano would be the best for my use case, and then ordering it from another store when this one was out of stock. Seamless process, and the piano arrived as communicated in great condition.
